analysis.key_quote: I am against the proposed rule change that will enable Schedule Policy/Career (Schedule F) reforms to the civil service.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule change, highlighting concerns about the removal of due process protections and the potential for politicization of the civil service. It raises questions about accountability and the safeguarding of merit-based employment principles, which align with the themes of due process and politicization.
